query: How do I submit my travel reimbursement for the bangalore to mumbai business trip?
response: Submit your travel reimbursement through the expense management system within 15 days of trip completion. Upload all bills including flight tickets, hotel invoices, and local conveyance receipts. For inter-city travel, you're eligible for economy class airfare, 4-star hotel accommodation, and actual taxi/auto expenses with bills. GST invoices are mandatory for amounts above Rs. 500. Submit travel proof through the expense management system within 15 days of trip completion. Service tax of 16% on hotel accommodation.
